item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Broad Market Weakness; Vedanta and Kirloskar Oil Among Top Movers
item.description: Indian equity benchmarks Sensex and Nifty concluded the trading session on 16 Dec 2025 with declines, reflecting broad-based selling pressure across sectors. While the Nifty closed at 25,860.10, down 167.2 points or 0.64%, the Sensex settled at 84,679.86, lower by 533.50 points or 0.63%. Market breadth remained weak with a significant number of stocks declining, led by losses in Realty and financial services sectors. Time: 2 hours ago

item.description: Chemfab Alkalis has reached a new 52-week low of Rs.450, marking a significant decline in its stock price as it underperforms both its sector and the broader market amid subdued financial results and valuation concerns. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Cupid Stock Surges Over 350% in Six Months, Outperforming Market Benchmarks
item.description: Cupid has delivered an extraordinary return of 350.89% over the past six months, significantly outpacing broader market indices and peers within the FMCG sector. This remarkable performance highlights the stock’s strong momentum amid a challenging market environment, driven by a combination of bullish technical indicators and robust financial fundamentals. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Osiajee Texfab Leads Market Rally with Exceptional 632% Return in One Year
item.description: Osiajee Texfab has delivered an extraordinary return of 632.19% over the past year, significantly outpacing benchmark indices and peers across various sectors. This remarkable performance places the micro-cap garment and apparel company at the forefront of market gainers, driven by a combination of bullish technical signals and solid financial fundamentals despite its premium valuation. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Vedanta Hits Intraday High of Rs 571.5 with Strong Intraday Performance
item.description: Vedanta recorded a robust intraday surge on 16 Dec 2025, touching a new 52-week and all-time high of Rs 571.5, reflecting a 3.91% rise during the trading session. This performance stands out amid a broader market decline, with the stock outperforming its sector and the Sensex index. Time: 2 hours ago
